1.title: Princess Cakes
1.plot: It's a battle for the crown as grandmother granddaughter duos create elegant princess cakes worthy of royalty. But, will these talented kids be able to keep their quirky grandmas in check as they try to bake and decorate cakes that are fit for a fairy tale? Buddy is joined by Carlo's royalty to judge, Joey, and the Queen of Next Great Baker, Marissa Lopez.

2.title: Amusement Park Cakes
2.plot: There's a lot of ups and downs, as talented baking duos take on a challenge they never have before while creating spectacular amusement park cakes. It's a wild ride, as Buddy, his sister Lisa and head sculptor Ralph decide which cake was worth the price of admission.

3.title: Candy Cakes
3.plot: It's a challenge so sweet you'll probably get a cavity, as two mother daughter teams make Candy Cakes for Buddy, his sister Lisa and Carlo's decorator, Jessica. These kids ride a sugar high all the way to the finish line for one of the most surprising results of the season.

4.title: Gravity Defying
4.plot: Two teams of bakers battle the forces of nature as Buddy challenges them with Gravity Defying cakes. They'll have to create structures that trick the eye and don't come tumbling down for Mauro, Buddy, and his sister Grace.

5.title: Sculpted Animal Cakes
5.plot: Two parent and child teams are getting in touch with their wild sides. From a piglet who might lose his head, to a whale without a tail, Buddy, his wife Lisa, and head decorator Liz have their work cut out for them as they judge these sculpted animal cakes.

6.title: Galaxy Cakes
6.plot: Two couples shoot for the moon, as the bakers face off to make galaxy cakes. Will one team's ambitious plan launch them to victory? Or will the artistic, ethereal design take the cake? Buddy, his sister Grace, and head sculptor Ralph will decide.

7.title: Unicorn Cakes
7.plot: Imaginations run wild as two mother and daughter teams try their hand at making unicorn cakes. But just like a unicorn only has one horn, there will only be one winner. Buddy, his sister Mary, and head decorator Liz will decide which unicorn is the most magical.

8.title: Birthday Cakes
8.plot: The Cake Boss is seeing double, as two sets of twin bakers make multi-tiered birthday cakes for Buddy, Chad and Buddy's sister Mary; a mother of twins. Not all twins are a alike, but in order to win, they'll have to put sibling rivalry aside to get that taste of victory.

9.title: Food Fake Out Cakes
9.plot: It's time to chow down as two parent and child teams create food fake out cakes. Will a home-style pot of chicken soup be able to compete with a giant ice cream sundae? Buddy, his cousin Frankie, and pastry chef Chad will decide.

10.title: Italian Throw Down
10.plot: Holy Cannoli. The gloves are off as two sister teams create cakes and Italian desserts. Which team will impress Buddy and judges Joey and Chad with the familiar flavors they grew up with?

11.title: Sci Fi Cakes
11.plot: The Force is in the kitchen, as Buddy challenges contestants to create sci-fi cakes that are out of this world. Carlo's bakery veterans, Mauro and Ralph help Buddy decide whether a UFO or Zombie will take the cake.

12.title: Halloween Cakes
12.plot: Buddy lays down a ghoulish gauntlet as sibling teams bake and decorate their spookiest Halloween cakes. Buddy's two favorite witches - his sister Grace and Next Great Baker Marissa Lopez, join him on judging all the gory details.

13.title: Pinata Cakes
13.plot: It's a challenge that is chock full of surprises, as two husband and wife teams create exciting Pinata Cakes. They'll have to go above and beyond the traditional donkey to impress Mauro, Buddy and his head pastry chef Chad.

14.title: Fantasy Cakes
14.plot: Once upon a time, at a test kitchen in New Jersey, Buddy challenged two mother daughter teams to make imaginative Fantasy Cakes. But, if they want to have a fairy tale ending, they'll need to impress Buddy, Carlo's toughest critic Mary, and best sculptor Ralph.

15.title: Cupcake Bouquets
15.plot: Spring is in the air as the bakers create cupcake bouquets. Structure is a thorn in one team's side, but overpowering flavor threatens the other. Who will Buddy, his sister Madeline, and his head baker Joey crown the winner?

16.title: Wedding Cakes
16.plot: Two husband and wife teams square-off, vowing to create the greatest wedding cake Buddy has ever seen. They'll be judged by two of Carlo's biggest love birds, Mauro and Madeline, as both teams showcase the keys to their success in baking and marriage.

17.title: Topsy Turvy Thanksgiving Cakes
17.plot: Two cousin teams hope Fall isn't in the air as they create Topsy Turvy Thanksgiving Cakes. Buddy, along with head baker Joe, and Marissa have a hard decision when they taste a sweet potato cake for the first time.

18.title: Gingerbread Cakes
18.plot: It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas as mother and daughter teams battle it out to see who can make the most impressive gingerbread house. Will the seasoned bakery owners win it all? Or will the newbies take home the prize? Buddy, his sister Grace, and brother-in-law Joey, will decide who's been naughty and who's been nice.

imdb.title: Bake It Like Buddy
plot: Two families compete in a cooking competition for the chance to win a cash prize.
